name: Pixel Society
description:
What is Pixel Society? Pixel Society is a 2D Dungeon Crawler MMO that is currently being developed by Crosshair Studios.

When will Pixel Society be released?  We are not certain on a release date, but we can predict that the Pixel Societies beta will be released within the next few months.

How do I play?  Every so often we release a prototype of the game so people can test the current version.
